technology.short_description: Battle-hungry marauders wade into the foe, enmity and malice powering their blows against anything within reach.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Melee Marauder, Kurgan Hunters, Mounted Kurgan Hunters, Marauder Chariots units
	(all armies)

Missile Resistance: +10% for Marauder Hunter, Whaler, and Marauder Horsemen units
	(all armies)

technology.short_description: These warriors zealotry pleases the Dark Gods greatly and eases their path to glory.

effects.description:
Enables "Discouraging" Attacks for Berserkers, Crimson Skull Cultists, and Skull Binders units
	(all armies)

Magic Resistance: 10% for Aspirants units
	(all armies)

Enables "Causes Fear" Attribute for Marauder Champions and Marauder Horsemasters units
	(all armies)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

technology.short_description: Along centuries, Wulfrik has plundered all manner of arcane artifacts and magical weapons, the most powerful of which are those warped by the touch of Chaos.

effects.description:
Enables Magical Attacks for Huskarls, Huskarls (Spears), Huskarls (Halberds), and Mounted Huskarls units
	(all armies)

Missile Resistance: +10% for Dragonship Reavers, Ice Wolves Chariots, and Hung Raiders units
	(all armies)

Enables "Blinding" Attacks for Huskarls, Huskarls (Spears), and Mounted Huskarls units
	(all armies)

technology.short_description: When Throgg marches to war, his legions of trolls and mutated beasts leave only broken bodies and twisted wreckage in their wake.

effects.description:
Vigour Loss Reduction %-n% for Norscan Warhounds, Bloodhounds, Ice Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls
	(all armies)

technology.short_description: Demonic sinew and ectoplasmic blood lend Norscan monsters a speed in battle quite at odds with their enormity.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Manticore, Giant, Frost Wyrm, Mammoth units
	(all armies)

technology.short_description: Diabolical wards of protection can turn aside the enemy's blows.

effects.description:
Ward Save: +5% for Skinwolves, and Fimirs units
	(all armies)

technology.short_description: Seafang's progress through the Chaos Realms requires unwavering faith and unerring devotion to Wulfrik, both steadied by the presence of one's brothers in carnage.

effects.description: Cooldown: -2 turns for Seafang Teleportation ritual

Income from sacking settlements: +50%
	(faction leader)

technology.short_description: "What it senses, we do. In its sudden turn, our infallible response. In its knowing malice, our own."

effects.description: Attribute: Expert Charge Defence when fighting against Slaaneshi factions

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

effects.description: Lord recruit rank: +5
Unit experience gain: +10%

technology.short_description: "Our flesh is stronger than we know, our blades sharper. We will test them. We *must* test them, against mortal and immortal alike."

effects.description: Replenishes 20% campaign movement range after razing a settlement
Melee attack: +4 for Marauder Infantry units
Melee defence: +8 when fighting against Khornate factions

technology.short_description: "We make our Shamans' dreams real. Yet there was always a way for them to do it themselves. They have been shown the way."

effects.description:
Spell intensity: +10%
	(all characters)

Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +10
	(all armies)
Spell resistance: 30% when fighting against Tzeentchian factions

technology.short_description: "The cold has made us hardy. The Crow will make us invincible."

effects.description: Attribute: Immune to Contact Effects when fighting against Nurglish factions

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
Physical resistance: 10% for Norscan Monster units

technology.short_description: Nowhere else but under the shadow of Chaos are such brutish and degenerate killers nurtured and bred.

effects.description: Recruit rank: +1 for Marauder units
Leadership: +4 for Marauder units

technology.short_description: Sharper throwing-axes forged in larger numbers mean more dismemberment and decapitation on the battlefield.

effects.description: Ammunition: +15% for Marauder Hunter units
Missile strength: +8% for Marauder Hunter units

technology.short_description: The correct expertise and equipment enables the Marauders' swift, blood-fed steeds to be ridden at their greatest speeds.

effects.description: Reload time reduction: +10% for Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units
Speed: +10% for Marauder Horsemen, Marauder Horsemasters and Kurgan Horsemen units

technology.short_description: A piece of armour is no harder than the anvil upon which it is fashioned.

effects.description: Armour: +8 for Marauder Champions and Marauder Berzerkers units
Melee defence: +4 for Marauder Champions and Marauder Berzerkers units

technology.short_description: Every new war brings the Marauders bloody, gore-drenched glory in battle, whether in victory or in death.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +5% for Marauder units
Physical resistance: 10% for Marauder units (Rank 7 and above)

technology.short_description: To pierce the heart of a Norscan stronghold is a challenge they themselves impose on their would-be attackers as but another form of slaughter.

effects.description: Defensive supplies: +600
Attrition: -20% when under siege
Construction time: -1 for Garrison buildings

technology.short_description: Sometimes it is enough to know, and wait. The opportunity for bloodshed always comes, sooner or later.

effects.description: Raise the Palisades commandment: additional +5 Melee defence
Summon the Chieftains commandment: additional +1 Local recruitment capacity

technology.short_description: The smell of blood rouses a raider's spirit; the promise of mead bolsters it further; the sight and sound of the sea assures him fully that victory awaits.

effects.description: Construction cost: -10% for Ports
Construction time: -1 for Ports

technology.short_description: Sailing into the unknown is always easier with more space for supplies.

effects.description: Income from Ports: +10%
After using Pillage and Raze, the Pillaging Force is summoned with an additional 3 units

technology.short_description: "Those who are not of our own stock, we pillage and destroy. Those who are, we master."

effects.description: Attribute: Unbreakable when fighting against Norsca

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

effects.description: Recruit rank: +1 for all units
Global recruitment capacity: +2

technology.short_description:
"Predators? We are them. Beasts?...
	We *are* them."

effects.description: Enables orion's ability to spot everything in forests against beastmen
When fighting against Beastmen, enemy units in forests are revealed regardless of distance
Campaign movement range: +10%
Ambush success chance: +25%

technology.short_description: "Those who call themselves the Warriors of Chaos... Once they served. Do they serve yet? We care not. We only serve ourselves. This is *true* Chaos."

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos
Upkeep: -3%
Leadership: +4

technology.short_description: Prolonged exposure to the dark energies of the bitter, frozen north creates the toughest and most monstrous freaks.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +5% for Norscan Ice Trolls, Chaos Frost Dragon, Norscan Ice Wolves units
Fire resistance: 50% for Norscan Ice Trolls, Chaos Frost Dragon, Norscan Ice Wolves units
Attribute: Stalk for Norscan Ice Trolls, Chaos Frost Dragon, Norscan Ice Wolves units

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

technology.short_description: Norscans are well-known for scoffing at fatigue in battle and revelry. Few would surmise the same attitude is put into their watchfulness, as well.

effects.description: Campaign line of sight: +15% for settlements
Control: +2

technology.short_description: The sharp-minded amongst the tribes of the frozen wastes hint at the greater purpose behind their apparently indiscriminate acts of violence.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +10 with Chaos Dwarfs, Warriors of Chaos, Beastmen and Norsca
Allegiance points gained: +20%
Allied recruitment cost: -15%

technology.short_description: Once a Norscan's purpose is established, they can set about exacting the means in a much more deliberate manner.

effects.description: Tradable resources produced: +15%
Income from Gem and Gold Mines: +50%

technology.short_description: A presentiment of a triumphant revelry fans the flames that would feed its fires.

effects.description: Construction cost: -15% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
Construction time: -1 for Province Capital/Settlement buildings

technology.short_description: "The Four are always watching. Eagles' eyes reflected in the fires of revelry, hounds baying at roasting flesh, crows circling above the morsels, serpents slithering among the flames"

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +10 with Daemons of Chaos

Chaos Undivided corruption: +3
	(all provinces)

technology.short_description: "...we multiply, so we may bury the mortal world under crimson ice."

effects.description: Population surplus: +1 for newly-captured settlements

technology.short_description: The Four watch, always. What they deign to see depends on the power and Ruinous purpose of those who are watched.

effects.description: Lord recruit rank: +4
Hero recruit rank: +3
Hero capacity: +1 for all Heroes

technology.short_description: With sorcerous secrets revealed, the Balefiends will be drawn - like moths to a flame.

effects.description:
Spell intensity: +5%
	(all characters)

Winds of Magic cost: -8% for Lore of Fire spells
	(all armies)

Winds of Magic cost: -8% for Lore of Shadows spells
	(all armies)

technology.short_description: Crows who make the north their home, despite the cleverness and frailty inherent to them, are seen as no mere crows.

effects.description:
Chance of a plague spreading: -25%
	(all armies)

Plague duration: -1 turns
	(all armies)
Growth: +15

technology.short_description: Dissolution in the face of Chaos holds no terror for Norscans. It is a reminder of their devotion and a call to foster strength.

effects.description: Marauders to Builders commandment: additional +10 Growth
Venerate the Four commandment: additional +3 Control

technology.short_description: Weapons and armour are not the only apparatus of war  so too are the tools used to forge them.

effects.description: Construction cost: -10% for Military Recruitment buildings
Construction time: -1 for Military Recruitment buildings

technology.short_description: The true implements of slaughter are those who toil to fashion them  whether they like it or not.

effects.description: Income: +8% for Economy buildings
Control: +2

technology.short_description: The arrogance of these Elves, they think they know how to deal pain? We shall show them true pain!

effects.description: Income: +15% for Economy buildings

Armour-piercing missile damage: +4
	(all armies)
Missile resistance: 15% when fighting against Dark Elves

technology.short_description: Svengars defeat at LAnguille was an age ago - the Bretonnian Dukes shall soon fall!

effects.description: Attribute: Charge Defence vs Large when fighting against Bretonnia

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.

effects.description: Speed: +10% for Marauder Chariot & Marauder Cavalry units
Charge bonus: +10%

technology.short_description: The soft men of the Empire think themselves the pinnacle of civilisation  time to bring them down a notch!

effects.description: Attribute: Causes Fear when fighting against Empire

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

effects.description: Income from sacking settlements: +15%
After using Pillage and Raze, the Pillaging Force is summoned with an additional 3 units

technology.short_description: They merely adopted the cold  we were born in it, molded by it.

effects.description: Ward save: 10% when fighting against Kislev

Chaos Undivided corruption in adjacent provinces: +1
	(all provinces)
Passive ability: "Permafrost Wards" for Norscan Ice Trolls, Chaos Frost Dragon and Norscan Ice Wolves units

technology.short_description: Let them feel the hammer not on anvil, but on flesh. Let the molten industry be consumed by flame!

effects.description: Casualties captured post-battle: +25%
Fire resistance: 40% when fighting against Chaos Dwarfs
Attribute: Unyielding Assault for Curs'd Ettin and Norscan Giant units

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can never have its Melee Attack reduced during battle.

technology.short_description: A hunter without knowledge of his quarry is like a warrior without knowledge of his enemy.

effects.description: Speed: +10% for Norscan Ice Wolves & Norscan Warhounds units
Charge bonus: +10 for Norscan Ice Wolves & Norscan Warhounds units

technology.short_description: For some abominations of the north, a mere whiff of blood is enough to lose all restraint.

effects.description: Vigour loss reduction: -50% for Skin Wolves units
Physical resistance: 10% for Skin Wolves units

technology.short_description: Everyone and every *thing* can earn their seat at a feast, but keeping it is a matter of some skill  and some luck in who or what you sit next to.

effects.description: Hero recruit rank: +3 for Fimir Nobles
Hero recruit rank: +3 for Fimir Balefiends
Hero capacity: +1 for Fimir Nobles
Hero capacity: +1 for Fimir Balefiends

technology.short_description: The only fit fate for these preening, foppish beanpoles is to be cut, cleaved and butchered.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +3 per turn
	(all armies)
Attribute: Glorious Charge when fighting against High Elves

related_attributes.bullet_text:
When charging into an enemy unit:
	  Charge Bonus duration is doubled.
	 Enemy units take a  Leadership penalty as if they have been attacked in the flank.

effects.description: Hero recruit rank: +3

technology.short_description: From afar, let us watch the sweet flame engulf their precious tree-kin!

effects.description: Speed: +10% when fighting against Wood Elves

Reload time reduction: +15%
	(all armies)
Attribute: Strider for Norscan Monster units

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

technology.short_description: Clogging up the land with soulless vessels, the Vampires and their Necromantic allies are a scourge to be eradicated.

effects.description: Vigour loss reduction: -50% when fighting against Vampire Counts

Battle healing cap: +25%
	(all armies)
Hero capacity: +1 for all Heroes

technology.short_description: Entrenched in their Holds, the stunties fiercely protect their lucrative mines, offering both a good fight and valuable plunder.

effects.description: Income from all buildings: +8%
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +4 when fighting against Dwarfs
Armour: +8 for Infantry units

technology.short_description: The North offers rest to its weaker whelps atop the bone heap. The strong, brindled with scars and blood-ravened, dare anyone to tame them, or die.

effects.description: Recruit rank: +1 for Trolls, Fimir Warriors, Skin Wolf, Ice Wolf and Warhound units
Leadership: +4 for Trolls, Fimir Warriors, Skin Wolf, Ice Wolf and Warhound units

technology.short_description: The more long-lived a Troll, the more indomitable its constitution, and the more pregnable it is to the bolstering energies of Chaos.

effects.description: Melee defence: +5 for Troll units
Bonus vs Infantry: +5 for Troll units

technology.short_description: Placation is the only language spoken by some creatures in the Norscan ranks. It is spoken very slowly, while looking them in the eye.

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for Fimir Warriors units
Weapon strength: +8% for Fimir Warrior units

technology.short_description: Scars may cripple a human, but it is how Northern creatures who were once less-than-human become so much more.

effects.description: Armour: +8 for Trolls, Fimir Warriors, Skin Wolf, Ice Wolf and Warhound units
Missile resistance: 15% for Trolls, Fimir Warriors, Skin Wolf, Ice Wolf and Warhound units (Rank 7 and above)

technology.short_description: Only one voice can silence the baying, braying, screeching and screaming hordes of Norsca. One who must deserve the right to call on them.

effects.description: Upkeep: -3%
Recruitment cost: -15%

Local recruitment capacity: +2
	(all provinces)

technology.short_description: Let nothing remain of us but the ice in our hearts.

effects.description:
Character experience gain: +15%
	(all characters)

Ward save: 5%
	(all characters)

Unit mass: +15%
	(all armies)

technology.short_description: With their name, Norscans instil dread. With their acts, they enact terror. With what they leave behind, they breed horror.

effects.description: Vigour loss reduction: -50% when defending
Control: -5 in enemy provinces where an army is present
Income from raiding: +25%

technology.short_description: What Norscans leave behind is blood and gore. What Norscans take is something more than that.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +20%
Income from post-battle loot: +10%
Magic item drop chance from battle: +20%

technology.short_description: Whether it is material wealth, or just good ideas, all manner of assets can be stolen from organised men.

effects.description: Casualties captured post-battle: +15%
Income from sacking settlements: +10%

technology.short_description: When the Marauders eagerness for despoilment is nurtured, vast distances can be covered between raids.

effects.description: Income and Spoils from pillaging settlements: +20%
After using Pillage and Raze, the Pillaging Force is summoned with an additional 3 units

technology.short_description: Let them build their Bastion; let them muster their pampered peoples. In time, all shall be rubble and corpses.

effects.description: Attribute: Mastery of Elemental Winds for all spellcasters

related_attributes.bullet_text: When two or more units in the same army share this attribute,  intensity increases the power of spells cast.
When two or more units in the same army share this attribute,  intensity increases the power of spells cast.

effects.description: Attribute: Vanguard Deployment when fighting against Cathay

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

effects.description: Construction cost: -50% for Garrison buildings

technology.short_description: "...Where ends the endless rowing, raging, ravaging? Only the blood can show. What does it show? Only the Shamans know"

effects.description: Hero recruit rank: +3 for Skin Wolf Werekin
Hero recruit rank: +3 for Shaman-Sorcerers
Hero capacity: +1 for Skin Wolf Werekin
Hero capacity: +1 for Shaman-Sorcerers

technology.short_description: In the North, the stars may sometimes become unmoored in the sky, pointing the way for Norscans who know what it means.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

Campaign line of sight: +15%
	(all characters)

technology.short_description: The stars point the way. The land accommodates itself to those who follow it.

effects.description: Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from all attrition

Battle reinforcement time: -25%
	(all armies)

Reinforcement range: +25%
	(all armies)

technology.short_description: Whether fighting at sea or on land, the longship Marauders are the most seasoned veterans of the Norscan tribes.

effects.description: Global recruitment duration: -1 turn for all units
Global recruitment capacity: +2

technology.short_description: Once youve rowed the breadth of the Middle Sea a few times, relentless slaughter does little to tire you

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%
Vigour loss reduction: -25%

technology.short_description: Give a captive a sword and he becomes an expendable sparring partner.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
Unit experience gain: +10%

technology.short_description: Experience in swinging your weapon on the roiling seas proves to yield devastating results when braced by solid ground.

effects.description: Armour-piercing weapon damage: +50 for embedded Heroes
Melee attack: +5 for embedded Heroes
Melee defence: +5 for embedded Heroes

technology.short_description: Some who die under the Hounds eye, do not truly die. One needs only the strength to withstand both their wounds and their resurrection.

effects.description:
Hit points: +10%
	(all characters)

Wound recovery time: -2 turns
	(all characters)
Passive ability: "The Hound's Gaze" for all lords

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death.

technology.short_description: The war never ends because combatants slain are rarely dead for long...

effects.description: Attribute: Stalk when fighting against Vampire Coast

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

effects.description: Income from Ports: +15%

Immune to High Seas, Reef and Storm attrition
	(all armies)

technology.short_description: "And what do the Shamans know? The more we row, and rage, and ravage, the more the blood can show, the more the Shamans know, where ends the endless"

effects.description:
Spell intensity: +5%
	(all characters)

Winds of Magic cost: -10% for Lore of Metal spells
	(all armies)

Winds of Magic cost: -8% for Lore of Death spells
	(all armies)

technology.short_description: Being set upon by a band of Norscan hunters is little different from being hunted by a pack of wolves, with a similarly violent outcome.

effects.description: Ambush success chance: +20%
Ambush defence chance: +30%

technology.short_description: To some, the brutal landscape of Norsca is a useful impediment to the warping Chaos Wastes. Others seek to overcome it for a sliver of the power from beyond.

effects.description: Hero action cost: -20%
Hero action success chance: +10%
Enemy Hero action success chance: -10%

technology.short_description: Gusts and currents carry Norscans forth. But what drives them is the Winds.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +2 per turn
	(all armies)

Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +10
	(all armies)

technology.short_description: The Winds speak with the voices of the Powers that engendered them. Baying, whispering, and gurgling and tempting.

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: -25%
	(all characters)
Passive ability: "Chaos Conduit" for all spellcasters

technology.short_description: Hunt the cold-bloods, defile their sacred spaces, pillage and take all we can!

effects.description: Attribute: Immune to Psychology when fighting against Lizardmen

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

effects.description:
Cooldown: -10% to all spells
	(all characters)
Melee defence: +4 for Norscan Monster units

technology.short_description: Deserts are for the dead, but the tomb-lurkers insist they live. Show them the truth.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, your Lords will be wounded instead
Attribute: Devastating Flanker when fighting against Tomb Kings

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.

effects.description: Income and Spoils from pillaging settlements: +15%

technology.short_description: Slaughter the ratmen - the step-children of our Dark Lords. We are the true inheritors!

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +30%
Speed: +10% for Marauder infantry units
Bonus vs Infantry: +8 when fighting against Skaven

technology.short_description: The Greenskins love for war almost matches that of the Norscan tribes  let savagery be met with savagery!

effects.description: Weapon strength: +8% for Norscan Monster units
Income from post-battle loot: +15%
Melee attack: +8 when fighting against Greenskins

technology.short_description: So fat and satisfied  their dedication to the Great Maw blinds them from the truth marching to their mawstep.

effects.description: Unit mass: +20% for Norscan Monster units
Melee attack: +8 for Mammoth units
Bonus vs Large: +8 when fighting against Ogres

technology.short_description: The eerie green glow of the Dark Moon calls out all manner of feral monstrosities from the Norscan wilderness.

effects.description: Melee defence: +4 for Dread Maw & Feral Manticore units
Missile resistance: 15% for Dread Maw & Feral Manticore units

technology.short_description: For those who dwell in the shadow of Chaos, monster hunting is a most savage pleasure.

effects.description: Speed: +10% for Chimera and Chaos Frost Dragon units
Melee attack: +4 for Chimera and Chaos Frost Dragon units
Unlocks the Monster Hunt for The Voice of the Wastes

technology.short_description: "...War begins where Chaos does. The source of blood and pain, Winds-torn, flesh-worn, sea-borne, it carries on..."

effects.description: Attribute: 360 Missile Block for Norscan Trolls, Skin Wolf and Curs'd Ettin units (Rank 7 and above)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can block projectiles regardless of its facing.

effects.description: Missile Block Chance: +20% for Norscan Trolls, Skin Wolf and Curs'd Ettin units
Battle healing cap: +50% for Norscan Trolls, Skin Wolf and Curs'd Ettin units
Ward save: 10% for Norscan Trolls, Skin Wolf and Curs'd Ettin units

technology.short_description: No one knows how Wulfrik and his vessel are bound to each other. As his crew grows, newcomers are quickly warned not to ask.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +8% when in foreign territory

Increased plunder from encounters at sea
	(factionwide)

technology.short_description: The secret to taming the horrors of the Wastes is as simple as it is difficult to obtain. Find the line between fearlessness and madness. Straddle it. Do not fall.

effects.description: Recruit Rank: +1 for Norscan Monster units
Leadership: +4 for Norscan Monster units

technology.short_description: Tree trunks or boulder-fashioned bludgeons never outlast the Giants who brandish them. Custom-made armaments, while comical from afar, are terrifying to behold up close.

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Norscan Giant units
Bonus vs Large: +10 for Norscan Giant units

technology.short_description: The Ettins' curse may have rendered them near-immortal. Then again, it may have been their pure, ravening spite at the world, and themselves.

effects.description: Melee defence: +5 for Curs'd Ettin units
Physical resistance: 10% for Curs'd Ettin units

technology.short_description: Few creatures have endured such depredation from human and inhuman hunters alike  a Mammoth dies on its own terms and no one else's.

effects.description: Unit mass: +20% for Feral Mammoth & War Mammoth units
Charge bonus: +10 for Feral Mammoth & War Mammoth units
Unlocks the Monster Hunt for The Great Mawherd

technology.short_description: To kill the beast, you must think like the beast."
